name: MEDIONCronos
0:
”Alexa, ask MEDION Smart for status”
”Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to start cleaning”
”Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to go back home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: medion smart
des:
Note: In order to fully use the skill you need a MEDION MD18861/MD18871 robot vaccum cleaner and the related MEDION MD18861/Cronos app.

If it has to go really fast, you can control me comfortably and intuitively with Alexa. I will answer. I promise.

According to your call, I will start cleaning individual rooms, defined areas as e.g. living area or the whole house.

Status:

"Alexa, ask Medion Smart what he's doing right now."
"Alexa, ask Medion Smart what the robot is doing right now."
"Alexa, ask Medion Smart for status"

Launch:

"Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to start vacuuming"
"Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to start cleaning."

Stop:

"Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to stop cleaning.

Pause:

"Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to pause the cleaning"

Going home:

"Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to go back home."

Clean a room (room names must first be defined in the MEDION Robot MD18861 app):

"Alexa, tell MEDION Smart to clean {article}{room name}

To use this command, the name of the Area must be one of the following room names

Kitchen
Bathroom
Living room
Bedroom
Children's room
Children's room one
Children's room two
Children's room three
Dining room
Hall
Office
Guest room
Toilet
Box room
Utility room
